name: Botslaught
description:
Game made for the Florida Polytechnic Game Jam Fall 2021.  

Play as Agent U, a member of Task Force Alphabet, as you break into a Facility being controlled by The Hive, a deadly robot army with intentions of taking over the world! Fight your way through 3 sections of the Facility, and stop them before it's too late!

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Dash
